description: I know the first thing you're going to do is to look at my photos! Go ahead, I'll wait.....I'm guessing if you've read this far it means I've passed the test. if not, well i guess it was not meant to be....I've done the sort-term dating thing and not knocking on it, but it's not for me. I'm looking for a genuine connection with someone that thinks it's okay to be a hopeless romantic. I'm a Pretty down to earth, enjoy spending time with family.
